	border-radius:1px;

	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{

}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);

}

					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

/** End Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/



/** Start Block Kit CSS: 142-3-a175df65179b9ef6a5ca9f1b2c0202b9 **/

.envato-block__preview{
	overflow: visible;
}

/* Border Radius */
.envato-kit-139-accordion .elementor-widget-container{
	border-radius: 10px !important;
}
.envato-kit-139-map iframe,
.envato-kit-139-slider .slick-slide,
.envato-kit-139-flipbox .elementor-flip-box div{
		border-radius: 10px !important;

}

.elementor-headline-animation-type-drop-in .elementor-headline-dynamic-wrapper{

}
.envato-kit-141-top-0 h1,
.envato-kit-141-top-0 h2,
.envato-kit-141-top-0 h3,

}

.envato-kit-141-bottom-0 p {

}

.envato-kit-141-bottom-8 .elementor-price-list .elementor-price-list-item .elementor-price-list-header {
	margin-bottom: .5rem;
}

.envato-kit-141.elementor-widget-testimonial-carousel.elementor-pagination-type-bullets .swiper-container {

}

}

           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-wider">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-60f66377 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="60f66377" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInLeft"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-36ef4b8 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="36ef4b8" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Objectives of our SE4GD programme
                </h3>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3e68a280 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="3e68a280" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Emphasize sustainable development through the use of software solutions
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Emphasize human aspects in sustainability
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Develop the education aspects of sustainability with the social perspective
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Educate ICT professionals with improved knowledge, skills and competences on sustainable development
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-813427a elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="813427a">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-f3d58fd" data-element_type="column" data-id="f3d58fd">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-09a2e3e elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="09a2e3e" data-widget_type="image.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <img alt="" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-824" decoding="async" height="552" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 599px) 100vw, 599px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Course-contents.jpg" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Course-contents.jpg 599w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Course-contents-300x276.jpg 300w" width="599"/>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-66 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4a11ba0" data-element_type="column" data-id="4a11ba0">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1b505bf elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1b505bf" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Our SE4GD programme is divided into following types of courses/content:
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  <b>
                   Core courses
                  </b>
                  with expertise in the given field/domain
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <b>
                   Seminar courses
                  </b>
                  with (local industry) to broaden your perspectives
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <b>
                   Master’s projects
                  </b>
                  to actually solve some of the given challenges
                  <b>
                   <br/>
                  </b>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <b>
                   Culturally oriented courses / content
                  </b>
                  to give you impressions of local sustainability challenges
                  <b>
                   <br/>
                  </b>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <b>
                   Summer schools
                  </b>
                  to link you with industry and other interested stakeholders
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <div>
                 <b>
                  Each of our semesters have theme for the studies:
                 </b>
                </div>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Software engineering fundamentals in Italy
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Sustainable software in Finland (and Russia)
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Software for sustainability in the Netherlands
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-13008e28 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="13008e28" data-settings='{"stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-narrow">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-45a6ac20 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="45a6ac20" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-38b5f319 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="38b5f319" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <br/>
                 Holistic perception to sustainable development
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1e80a6bc elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1e80a6bc" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The SE4GD programme covers the various sustainability dimensions in its contents:
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li style="list-style-type: none;">
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    Core courses focus on technical and environmental aspects e.g. considering the environmental effects of various ICT devices
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Your thesis project as well as industry seminars emphasize the economic aspects
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Social and individual aspects are considered in our culturally oriented courses
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 In all our actions we aim to carefully consider the impacts of these actions on these different sustainability dimensions
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-b509bd5 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="b509bd5" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-65ee790 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="65ee790" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <br/>
                 Emphasizing employability
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-62591b0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="62591b0" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 <span lang="EN">
                  SE4GD programme pays special attention to the
                  <strong>
                   employability of the programme students
                  </strong>
                  . Each semester has a specific theme for career skills.
                  <br/>
                 </span>
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  <span lang="EN">
                   The first semester focuses on IT lifestyle – what the students can expect of their work in the IT field.
                   <br/>
                  </span>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <span lang="EN">
                   The second semester adds entrepreneurial skills – how the students could use their skills founding their own companies.
                   <br/>
                  </span>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <span lang="EN">
                   The third semester emphasizes employability skills – how the students can point out their special skill set for the possible employers (or to the investors of their own company).
                  </span>
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 <span lang="EN">
                  These aspects are emphasized and integrated into the course contents
                 </span>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-07e1a09 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="07e1a09" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-fe65584 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="fe65584" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <br/>
                 Understanding others and working together
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c167ff4 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="c167ff4" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The SE4GD programme is based on a multicultural background by combining several different cultural areas.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Partners of the SE4GD programme have been selected to fulfill the aims of the programme in the best way. As
                 <b>
                  host, educational and industrial partners
                 </b>
                 are important for the implementation of the programme content,
                 <b>
                  regional and local partners
                 </b>
                 are important for the real-world sustainability challenges. As SE4GD already has a connection to local partners in all hosting countries as well and many target regions, the programme is confident that it can provide competent education for students interested in the sustainable future.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-8d794c5 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="8d794c5">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">

					'DOMContentLoaded',

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

                 <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                  <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-53071fe8 elementor-position-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-image-box" data-element_type="widget" data-id="53071fe8" data-widget_type="image-box.default">

                      <img alt="" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-194" decoding="async" height="500" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/02.png" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/02.png 500w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/02-300x300.png 300w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/02-150x150.png 150w" width="500"/>
                     </figure>
                     <div class="elementor-image-box-content">

          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-42f26168 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="42f26168" data-settings='{"stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-wider">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-7279fde0 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="7279fde0" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2265046e elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="2265046e" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 The attractiveness of the programme...
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7f10da5e elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="7f10da5e" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 …is based on the
                 <strong>
                  strong software engineering foundation
                 </strong>
                 and on the new perspective of combining sustainability with software development and emphasis on the effects on society. We believe our programme will attract you due to the
                 <strong>
                  increasing role of software in society
                 </strong>
                 and the
                 <strong>
                  wide possibilities of utilizing it in other sectors
                 </strong>
                 . Our strong network of well-known partners will provide you a strong and attractive content. The combination of sustainability, design and software engineering provides something for all of you.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Together we’ll tackle the sustainability challenges
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-ed9082d elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="ed9082d" data-settings='{"stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-wider">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-3003388 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="3003388" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ff668a4 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ff668a4" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Lifetime learning outcomes
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f973266 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="f973266" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  Students studying in the SE4GD programme will graduate with a different view of the world.
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <p>
                 As trained individuals you are able to see the environment around sustainable thinking, you will be driven to seek and use technology to improve the future of your society. You will learn highly transferable skills in software engineering and you will also be facilitated to write up your research and develop concept ideas.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  Our students will emerge highly employable.
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <p>
                 You will develop your personal learning plan at the outset of SE4GD and you will track your learning using reflective learning diary. You will build your CV (as part of the career education) during the programme. Using Active Learning Sets on Research Methods, within the Master’s thesis project, you will challenge your learning and begin a dialogue about how you learn and how you assimilate learning. This habit will be carried through all modules in the programme.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <b>
                  Staff will evolve with you.
                  <br/>
                 </b>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Staff will actively seek opportunities to gather feedback on their  performance as learning facilitators –the SE4GD programme will implement a code of practice for the staff that will ensure regular feedback from students and reflective discussion of teaching and learning practice with actions being documented and shared. As the programme aims to emphasize areas not covered before, each and every partner of the programme will learn new skills and competencies.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <b>
                  We will aim high.
                 </b>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Although the new perspectives will not change the fundamentals of the individual disciplines, they still have an effect. Our experiences show that the combination of ICT solutions and sustainable mindset attracts students, that are motivated and talented. Students that want to make change.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <b>
                  You will have your voices heard.
                 </b>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Students are encouraged to start a sustainability blog on the programme website.That way you have your voices heard already during the programme.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-5f38cd2 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="5f38cd2" data-settings='{"stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-narrow">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-1bf8159 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="1bf8159" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3f6ed8f elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="3f6ed8f" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Our common future –understanding others and working together
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ce478bd elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ce478bd" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The SE4GD programme is based on a multicultural background by combining several different cultural areas. The selection of the students into the programme will ensure multinationality that needs to be utilized in the programme execution. Content-specific to the learning of local culture and/or language in relation to the sustainability challenges is defined for each semester. Although language represents the cultural identity more important for the students is to learn the cultural aspects and sustainability challenges (we use our local and regional partners to extend this area).
                </p>
                <p>
                 Each hosting university will also provide some social/cultural events for the students. Hosting universities may also have closer collaboration with some of the partner universities. Students will be integrated into the socio-cultural environment within industry seminars and summer schools, and into all general work of the programme.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Even the preparation of this programme has impacted the ways the partners are thinking, working and networking. Partners of the SE4GD programme have been selected to fulfill the aims of the programme in the best way. As host, educational and industrial partners are important for the implementation of the programme content, regional and local partners are important for the real-world sustainability challenges. As SE4GD already has a connection to local partners in all hosting countries as well and many target regions, the programme is confident that it can provide competent education for students interested in the sustainable future.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-2261b636 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="2261b636" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-wider">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-1184abc elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="1184abc" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInLeft"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-16ea9ed1 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="16ea9ed1" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Extending the SE4GD scope
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-759f2201 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="759f2201" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The SE4GD project aims at having a strong impact in the utilization of software for sustainability goals (e.g. UN SDG goals). As the role of software for sustainability increases, the SE4GD programme will produce professionals with the needed expertise and the opportunities for these people in the academic world and in the industry will enhance.
                 <b>
                  We seek for highly motivated and talented applicants that want to make the change happen
                 </b>
                 .
                </p>
                <p>
                 The SE4GD programme aims to have an extended impact on sustainability. Rather than just improving technology, SE4GD aims to improve the efficiency of other domains like emphasized in the European Green Deal.
                </p>
                <p>
                 You as the graduate of the SE4GD programme will have the ability to solve problems in software design and engineering considering sustainability aspects and you will be prepared for a more sustainable future. As you work on real world problems provided by industry partners as well as local and regional partners, you may utilize your competencies  immediately. SE4GD aims to answer to an extremely important question;
                 <b>
                  how we can have an impact on the sustainable development on our planet
                 </b>
                 .
                </p>
               </div>

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-6db8598 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="6db8598" data-settings='{"stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>

               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Costs for participation in the SE4GD Master’s programme is
                 <strong>
                  4 500 € per year for students from Programme Countries
                 </strong>
                 and
                 <strong>
                  9 000 € per year for students from Partner Countries
                 </strong>
                 .
                </p>
                <p>
                 Applications to SE4GD programme and for Erasmus Mundus Scholarships are completed on one single
                 <a href="http://se4gd.emundus.io" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                   online application
                  </span>
                 </a>
                 . There is NO application fee.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Note: Students who have previously obtained an EMJMD scholarship or an Erasmus Mundus Master Course/Joint Doctorate scholarship are not eligible to apply.
                </p>

                <p>

                  <ul>

                    citizens of partner countries who have

                     not

                    carried out their main activity (studies, training or work) for more than a total of 12 months over the last five years in a programme country.
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <b>
                   Programme country students
                  </b>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    citizens of programme countries.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    citizens of partner countries who have carried out their main activity for more than a total of 12 months over the last five years in a programme country.
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </li>

          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-78bdc70 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="78bdc70" data-settings='{"stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-e54505c" data-element_type="column" data-id="e54505c">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ec175ee elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ec175ee" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <section class="container section-padding3">
                 <div class="row margin-btm2">
                  <div class="col-md-8 content">
                   <h3>
                    What is included in the participation cost?
                   </h3>
                   <ul>
                    <li>
                     <b>
                      participation fees
                     </b>
                     : tuition fees, educational expenses such as courses, academic supervision, exams, counselling and university support services such as student services, use of library services and use of IT services in accordance with university regulations and policy concerning degree studies.
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <b>
                      insurance
                     </b>
                     : including accident and health insurance satisfying the minimum requirements as published by the EACEA in its guidelines for Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees.
                    </li>
                   </ul>
                   <h3>
                    What is covered by installation, travel and subsistence costs?
                   </h3>
                   <ul>
                    <li>
                     travel from and to the original country of residence
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     visa and residence permit related costs
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     travel between SE4GD consortium countries and universities (including summer schools)
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     possible travel costs to internship positions or summer job positions, travel costs to thesis positions, if applicable
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     accommodation and personal living expenses
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     textbooks, personal computers or study materials the student decides to purchase
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     any other compulsory or voluntary local costs that may be charged according to the university rules (e.g. student union fees, casing of thesis) or national legislation.
                    </li>
                   </ul>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </section>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>

					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>

	border-radius:1px;

	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);

}
