                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Extend the sustainable perspectives to consider the need of various stakeholders
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Link the students with various stakeholders in a form of industry fair
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      Course content:
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      The course consists of the activities within the first summer school of each cohort. The purpose of the summer school is to extend the perceptions of the students beyond the courses in the programme by linking the students with the academic, local and regional partners as well as industry representatives. Each summer school will be planned with the organizing partner to reflect the local needs.
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      Course learning outcomes:
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Extending the knowledge on local sustainability challenges
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Knowledge of the needs of industry in sense of sustainability
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Knowledge of the regional perspectives to sustainability
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1.15;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Skills and competencies to communicate with various stakeholders on sustainable development
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                   </details>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4023437" data-element_type="column" data-id="4023437">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6ed2c85 elementor-widget elementor-widget-eael-adv-accordion" data-element_type="widget" data-id="6ed2c85" data-widget_type="eael-adv-accordion.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="eael-adv-accordion" data-accordion-id="6ed2c85" data-accordion-type="accordion" data-scroll-on-click="no" data-scroll-speed="300" data-toogle-speed="300" id="eael-adv-accordion-6ed2c85">
                 <div class="eael-accordion-list">
                  <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-1161" class="elementor-tab-title eael-accordion-header" data-tab="1" id="semester-3-software-for-sustainability-30-ects" tabindex="0">
                   <span class="eael-advanced-accordion-icon-closed">
                    <i aria-hidden="true" class="fa-accordion-icon fas fa-plus">
                    </i>
                   </span>
                   <span class="eael-advanced-accordion-icon-opened">
                    <i aria-hidden="true" class="fa-accordion-icon fas fa-minus">
                    </i>
                   </span>
                   <span class="eael-accordion-tab-title">
                    SEMESTER 3: SOFTWARE FOR SUSTAINABILITY (30 ECTS)
                   </span>
                   <i aria-hidden="true" class="fa-toggle fas fa-angle-right">
                   </i>
                  </div>
                  <div aria-labelledby="semester-3-software-for-sustainability-30-ects" class="eael-accordion-content clearfix" data-tab="1" id="elementor-tab-content-1161">
                   <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                    <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                     The objective of this semester is to build upon the skills and competencies acquired in the first year of studies, on software engineering foundations and sustainable software. The students learn to design modern service-oriented software, to understand its historical, current and future role in our society, and to assess the extent to which software systems impact target sustainability goals. The ‘Software for sustainability’ semester addresses the instrumental role of software towards sustainability. The courses are organized at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
                    </span>
                   </p>
                   <details>
                    <summary>
                     <strong>
                      Course 3.1: Service oriented design – 6 ECTS
                     </strong>
                    </summary>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      The aims of this course are to
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Teach advanced reasoning and design decision making techniques applicable to large service-oriented software systems, in both theory and practice.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Learn the notion of sustainability-quality, and how to include it in service oriented design.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      Course content:
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       The lectures provide the students with knowledge about how to identify the requirements for a service-oriented software system, how to map them on business services and transform them into complex networks of software services. Special emphasis is given to the design reasoning techniques for decision making, service identification, service-oriented software design, and how to address sustainability concerns. Each year experts from academia and/or industry are invited to give guest lectures
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Throughout the course, students work in teams in an industrial project, to design a software solution with challenging sustainability goals.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      Course learning outcomes:
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Ability to design software-intensive systems as complex service compositions
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Ability to explore the design space, make sound and well-motivated design decisions
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Ability to identify sustainability strategies and illustrate them into a software design solution
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Collaboration, interaction with industrial stakeholders and communication skills
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                    </p>
                   </details>
                   <details>
                    <summary>
                     <strong>
                      Course 3.2: Fundamentals of Adaptive Software
                      <br/>
                     </strong>
                    </summary>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      The aims of this course are to
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Educate on how to assess sustainability as a quality concern that software can address directly or indirectly.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Provide the instruments to embed sustainability into software projects, link sustainability explicitly to the software artifacts responsible for their realization, and associate significant metrics and indicators.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      Course content:
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       After giving a strong theoretical foundation in the multi-dimensional characterization of sustainability relevant for software engineering, as well as its representation over time- and space, the course provides the students with a set of practical tools for designing sustainability into their own project of choice. Several hands-on sessions in teamwork provide guidance and support in developing the project and building the necessary skills and competences.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      Course learning outcomes:
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Apply sustainability analysis to concrete and large-scale software projects.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Master critical thinking skills.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Be able to quantify and qualify sustainability impacts and the role of architecture design decisions in an interdisciplinary context.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                    </p>
                   </details>
                   <details>
                    <summary>
                     <strong>
                      Course 3.3: Green lab – 6 ECTS
                     </strong>
                    </summary>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      The aims of this course are to
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Learn the basics of empirical experimentation in the field of software engineering.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Be able to operate in a lab environment and build a successful experiment for software energy consumption.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Become familiar with the research problems in the field of green software engineering.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Understand and measure the impact of software over energy consumption.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                      Course content:
                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       The students work in teams to perform experiments in a controlled environment, on software energy consumption in particular, and on the effects of software on sustainability-quality in general. They have to carry out all the phases of empirical experimentation, from experiment design to operation, data analysis and reporting. During the lab sessions, students are assisted for technical operation of the lab equipment as regards measurement and data gathering. Students also receive the required training for data analysis and visualization (i.e. graphs, dashboards) using specialized software.
                      </span>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                    <p style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1.6em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">

                     </span>
                    </p>
                    <ul style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; margin: 0px 0px 1rem 3em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: disc; color: #000000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">
                     <li style="box-sizing: border-box; border: 0px; font-size: 14px; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;">
                      <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">
                       Ability to design, execute and report on an empirical experiment
                      </span>
                     </li>

								if( lazyloadBackground ) {

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{

}

						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

                <div class="page" title="Page 39">
                 <div class="layoutArea">
                  <div class="column">
                   <p>
                    Lappeenranta-Lahti University of Technology (established in 1969) is a Finnish national university of technology and economics, financed by the Ministry of Education. The most outstanding feature of the university is the way in which it has successfully integrated expertise in technology and economics. LUT`s location on the border between the EU and Russia has also had a major impact in the university’s activities and orientation. LUT is strongly focusing on sustainable solutions of the future in all of the disciplines covered by the university. Our Green Campus is the showcase of these activities.
                   </p>

              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e6317ff elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="e6317ff" data-widget_type="heading.default">

              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-94233b4 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="94233b4" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Established in 1952 (but its origins date back to the 16th century), the University of L’Aquila (UnivAQ) is a public teaching and research institution offering a full range of academic programs including biotechnologies, sciences, economics, engineering, education, humanities, medicine, psychology, and sport sciences. At present UAQ counts about 20,000 students, around 650 teachers and researchers, and nearly 500 administrative and technical staff members.
                </p>
                <p>
                 UnivAQ is located  in L’Aquila, the capital city of the Abruzzo region in Italy. Laid out within medieval walls upon a hillside in the middle of a narrow valley; tall snow-capped mountains of the Gran Sasso massif flank the town. A maze of narrow streets, lined with Baroque and Renaissance buildings and churches, open onto elegant piazzas. It is a lively college town and, as such, has many cultural institutions: a repertory theater, a symphony orchestra, a fine-arts academy, a state conservatory, a film institute. Check this
                 <a href="https://ecsa2020.disim.univaq.it/attending/local-information" rel="noreferrer noopener" style="box-sizing: inherit; color: #294a70; text-decoration: inherit;" target="_blank">
                  link
                 </a>
                 for more information about L’Aquila and the Abruzzo region.
                </p>
                <p>
                 SE4GreenDeal is hosted by the Department of Information Engineering, Computer Science and Mathematics (DISIM) and is currently running five Erasmus Mundus programs. The Software Engineering team is renowned worldwide for its hundreds of published articles, tens of research projects, and a multi-disciplinary view on the topic, ranging from model-driven, software architecture, software performance engineering, service-oriented engineering, autonomous systems and robotics software engineering. All reflected in
                 <span style="font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">
                  many courses offered on the topic.
                 </span>
                 <span style="font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">
                 </span>
                </p>

              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-b3859a8 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="b3859a8" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">

                 <br/>

                 <i>

              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0bc88cb elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="0bc88cb" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="">
                 The Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VU Amsterdam – VUA) founded in 1880, is a leading research university that ranks among the best in Europe. VUA employs many researchers who are among the best in their respective fields, at both national and international level, and for several years has been one of the leading academic research centres in Europe. VUA houses 12 faculties, 14 interdisciplinary research institutes, participates in two national research centres of excellence of which one as coordinating institution and is participant in 40 accredited research schools, of which 6 as coordinating institution. In total, the VU employs over 1,750 research FTE and yearly more than 6,650 academic articles, monographs and books are published and more than 300 doctorates are honoured.
                </div>
                <div class="">
                </div>
                <div class="">
                 As of 2020, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam has a new Strategic Plan.
                 <b class="">
                  Sustainable, enterprising and diverse
                 </b>
                 – these are the priority values that govern our actions, and the essence of our education, research, knowledge transfer, and operational management. The profile themes Governance for Society, Human Health & Life Sciences, Connected World and Science for Sustainability give substance to our mission. They also relate to the educational, research, and knowledge-transfer activities we use to enhance our multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary approaches.
                </div>
                <div class="">
                </div>
                <div class="">
                 The VUA campus is a welcoming and lively meeting place where students, teachers, researchers and the business community come together. The campus on Zuidas in Amsterdam has excellent educational facilities and research facilities and is a unique location for startups. It is also an easily accessible metropolitan meeting place thanks to its location in the immediate vicinity of Schiphol Airport. Being a true part of Amsterdam, VU Amsterdam is an international community that works together with knowledge partners, civil society and business.
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>

   const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);

                  SE4GD invites applications from top students of all nationalities. The admission process is competitive and only the best applicants are selected.
                 </b>
                </h2>

               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2>
                 <b>
                  Interested in applying to SE4GD?
                 </b>
                </h2>
                <ol>
                 <li>
                  Learn more about our
                  <a href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/programme/curriculum/">
                   <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                    curriculum,
                   </span>
                  </a>
                  <a href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/programme/hosting-partners/">
                   <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                    hosting universities
                   </span>
                  </a>
                  and
                  <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                   <a href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/about/consortium-and-industry-partners/" style="color: #0000ff;">
                    consortium members
                   </a>
                  </span>
                  . See also
                  <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                   r
                   <a href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/what-makes-se4gd-unique/" rel="noopener" style="color: #0000ff;" target="_blank">
                    easons to choose SE4GD
                   </a>
                  </span>
                  .
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Have a look at our
                  <a href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/application-process/admissions-requirements/">
                   <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                    admission requirements.
                   </span>
                  </a>
                  Pay special attention to the English language proficiency requirements. If a language test result is required from you, you should book a seat for a language test immediately because the current pandemic may influence the availability of test locations.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Start collecting your application documents.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Follow the instructions for applying and make sure you submit your application before the application deadline.
                 </li>
                </ol>
                <p>
                 In order to be considered for admission,
                 <strong>
                  your application must be completed in full
                 </strong>
                 , in accordance with all stated requirements, and
                 <strong>
                  submitted before the application deadline
                 </strong>
                 . There will be no exceptions to the admission criteria or the deadlines.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-c89db8a elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="c89db8a">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-2a9c412" data-element_type="column" data-id="2a9c412">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-fb80ce5 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="fb80ce5" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  About the application process
                 </b>
                 ...
                </h2>
               </div>

          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-7c24e5c5 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="7c24e5c5">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-wider">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-3860bf7" data-element_type="column" data-id="3860bf7">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5eb6fbc elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="5eb6fbc" data-widget_type="image.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <figure class="wp-caption">
                 <img alt="" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-856" decoding="async" height="536" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 758px) 100vw, 758px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Selection-process.jpg" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Selection-process.jpg 758w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Selection-process-300x212.jpg 300w" width="758"/>
                 <figcaption class="widget-image-caption wp-caption-text">
                 </figcaption>
                </figure>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-2b8a5fb elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="2b8a5fb" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2d710a6 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="2d710a6" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The student application and selection procedure will be organized in such a way that students will apply to the programme via LUT University (the coordinating partner) and then will be selected by a panel of SE4GD partners (Admission board) based on the selection processes outlined here.
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  The registration for the application procedure will be online via the
                  <a href="http://se4gd.emundus.io">
                   <span style="color: #000000;">
                    <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                     eMundus
                    </span>
                   </span>
                   <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                    service
                   </span>
                  </a>
                  . This service allows students to submit their applications and the needed appendices and allows the selection committee to collaborate in the selection process.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The application deadline for the applicants will be
                  <b>
                   18.1.2023 15.00 (UTC+2).
                  </b>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The applicants’ status will be updated as the process produces it.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  A second application period will be opened for self-funded students later in spring.
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 Self-funded students need to fulfill the minimum requirements of the programme, and the programme reserves the right to restrict the number of self-funded students.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-76d75aa elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="76d75aa">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-cc89d3b" data-element_type="column" data-id="cc89d3b">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-b3463af elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="b3463af" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Selection of  the  applicants ...
                 </b>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-fa246fe elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="fa246fe">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-wider">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-26a59be elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="26a59be" data-settings='{"animation":"fadeInUp"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-adea263 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="adea263" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 …is made in 3 steps (in both application periods):
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  The Admissions Office at LUT University checks eligibility of the applicants according to the outlined requirements. Applicants need to fulfill the host universities’ common student admission requirements for enrollment purposes.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The eligible applicants will be ranked by the
                  <strong>
                   Admission Board
                  </strong>
                  according to the Ranking Criteria (Quality) established by the programme consortium. Each academic partner will participate in the applicant evaluation process as each applicant is evaluated at least by two partners. Based on the ranking a predefined number of students  will be interviewed for final offers.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The Admissions Office of SE4GD checks the authenticity of the certificates and diplomas of the selected students.
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 The decision concerning approved candidates will be made based on the annual Admission Board selection meeting’s results and interviews.
                </p>
                <p>
                 The list with candidates signed by academic representatives from all hosting universities will be sent to the Agency. The students will be immediately informed by e-mail and via admission portal by change of their status (accepted, rejected or on the reserve list).
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-3eafe12 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="3eafe12">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-aca1e0c" data-element_type="column" data-id="aca1e0c">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0732e09 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="0732e09" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Applying as a self-funded students
                 </b>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-c16591a elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="c16591a">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-869c470" data-element_type="column" data-id="869c470">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1228111 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1228111" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Scholarship selection results are published in April.
                  <br/>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Application for self-funded positions opens in April  No Erasmus Mundus scholarships will be granted in this application round BUT you may apply for other scholarships/grants.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Applicants for the self-funded positions are evaluated with the same criteria as all the other applicants in the Erasmus Mundus scholarship call.
                  <br/>
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-527a578 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="527a578">

					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

                     </figure>
                     <div class="elementor-image-box-content">
