          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-b953ab1 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="b953ab1">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-118de64" data-element_type="column" data-id="118de64">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-268b62b elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="268b62b" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  You will first need to fulfill our general eligibility requirements. Only eligible applications proceed to the academic evaluation where the student selection criteria is applied.
                 </b>
                </h3>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-735fddc elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="735fddc">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-d4f89ed" data-element_type="column" data-id="d4f89ed">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-fa5dc05 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="fa5dc05" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 General eligibility requirements
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-54bae41 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="54bae41" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 To be considered eligible for SE4GD, you will need to fulfill these general eligibility requirements:
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Your previous
                  <strong>
                   higher education institution
                  </strong>
                  needs to be officially recognized.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Your previous
                  <strong>
                   degree
                  </strong>
                  needs to meet our requirements.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  If an
                  <strong>
                   English
                  </strong>
                  <strong>
                   language test result
                  </strong>
                  is required from you, your test scores will need to fulfill our minimum requirements and you will need to submit the test result as instructed before the given deadline.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  You will need to submit your online application and all compulsory
                  <strong>
                   application documents
                  </strong>
                  as instructed before the application deadline.
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 Please see further details below.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-01f2c20 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="01f2c20">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-56f09e1" data-element_type="column" data-id="56f09e1">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-389f569 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="389f569" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Requirements concerning previous higher education institution and degree
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-eeb660c elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="eeb660c" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Applicants should hold a Bachelor’s degree* awarded by a university or a higher education institution.
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  The scope of a relevant degree awarded by a higher education institution must be equivalent to
                  <strong>
                   180 ECTS credits (or equivalent) or at least three years of full-time study
                  </strong>
                  . The degree must give eligibility for Master-level studies in the awarding country.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The Bachelor’s degree is from
                  <strong>
                   Computer Science, Information Technology, Information Engineering, Information Sciences, Software Engineering, Business Informatics, Business Information
                  </strong>
                  **.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The university awarding you the degree you are applying with must fulfill the following rules:
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    The
                    <strong>
                     awarding institution has to be a recognized part of the official national education system of the country
                    </strong>
                    , i.e., to be listed as a degree-granting higher education institution by the country where it is located or by a relevant international organization such as UNESCO.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    <strong>
                     Listed on the
                     <a href="https://www.whed.net/home.php">
                      World Higher Education Database WHED
                     </a>
                    </strong>
                    by International Association of Universities.
                    <span style="color: #ffffff;">
                     <span style="color: #333333;">
                      <br/>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 *) Students in their final year of Bachelor education may also apply and if qualified, receive a conditional offer. If the applicant has not completed his/her studies, he/she should include a written statement from the degree administration office (or equivalent department), confirming that he/she is enrolled on the final year of her education and stating the expected completion date. However, the graduation needs to happen and degree certificates need to be provided at latest 31.8. 15.00 EET.
                </p>
                <p>
                 **) The selection committee will decide whether the applicant meets the requirements for admission regarding the suitability of the applicant’s degree.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-46f56a0 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="46f56a0">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-5e87ed8" data-element_type="column" data-id="5e87ed8">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2104466 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="2104466" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Requirements for English language proficiency
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-75e2dd9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="75e2dd9" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Our language of instruction is English, and the applicants are expected to have an excellent command of it. The accepted language tests and their minimum score requirements are listed below.
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  IELTS (Academic)*: 6.5 overall
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  TOEFL internet-based test*: 93 overall
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Cambridge Certificate in Advanced English (CAE): C
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Cambridge Certificate in Proficiency in English (CPE): C
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 *)
                 <em>
                  <em>
                   TOEFL iBT Special Home Edition Test and IELTS Indicator. These tests are offered by the test organisations if there is no possibility to take the normal tests due to COVID-19 situation.
                  </em>
                 </em>
                </p>
                <p>
                 <em>
                  <em>
                   Only the language tests mentioned above are accepted.
                  </em>
                 </em>
                 <em>
                  <em>
                   A Language Certificate issued by your home university or any other institution or organisation is not accepted.
                   <b>
                    The minimum requirements are very strict
                   </b>
                   . If your scores do not fulfill the minimum score requirements, your application will not be processed further. You cannot combine scores from different test dates (e.g.
                   <em>
                    TOEFL MyBest scores
                   </em>
                   is not accepted).
                  </em>
                 </em>
                 Language test results are valid for two years starting from the test date.
                 <em>
                  Your test result is verifiable on ETS Data Manager after approx. 6-8 days of taking the test.
                 </em>
                </p>
                <p>
                 <b>
                  <span lang="EN-US">
                   Upload the PDF copy of your Score Report to your Online Application Form
                  </span>
                 </b>
                 <span lang="EN-US">
                  NEW!
                 </span>
                 <span lang="EN-US">
                  If not having indicated our Institution Code at the time of taking the test, you no longer have to pay extra and send us the scores afterwards.
                 </span>
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Exceptions are made for students who have completed a degree of higher education in English in Australia, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, United Kingdom or the U.S.A.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <em>
                  Note that the student has 2 weeks time to supplement documents after the admission deadline, which means that the
                  <strong>
                   language test score needs to be provided latest on 31st of January to our se4gd email (se4gd ( at ) lut.fi)
                  </strong>
                  .
                 </em>
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-ddc6345 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="ddc6345">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-06357b0" data-element_type="column" data-id="06357b0">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ab22be0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ab22be0" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Pre-selection criteria (short listing for interviews)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-bb61dec elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="bb61dec" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The evaluation committee evaluates the applications.
                </p>
                <p>
                 The criteria and the weight of each criterion are the following (providing altogether 100 points):
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Academic record
                  </strong>
                  (
                  <strong>
                   max. 60 points
                  </strong>
                  )
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    Academic record is evaluated based on the contents of the previous degree (max. 30 points) and grade point average (max. 30 points)
                    <ul>
                     <li>
                      The contents of your previous degree is evaluated based on you transcript of record and a list of relevant courses with a scale (Not a match = 0, Weak match = 8, Moderate match = 15, Good match = 22, Excellent match = 30)
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      The cumulative grade point average of your studies is converted to 5-point scale by Admission committee and that is used for calculating points for CGPA with the following
                      <strong>
                       linear scale
                      </strong>
                      (CGPA 3-3.24 = 5 points, 3.25-3.74 = 11 points, 3.75-4.24 = 17 points, 4.25-4.74 = 23 points and 4.75-5.00 = 30 points)
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Motivation
                  </strong>
                  (
                  <strong>
                   max. 20 points
                  </strong>
                  )
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    Motivation letter is evaluated in scale (Insufficient = 0, Sufficient=5, Satisfactory = 8, Good=12, Excellent = 16, Outstanding=20)
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Track record
                  </strong>
                  (research publications, work experience, references, related extra curricular activities, etc.) (
                  <strong>
                   max. 20 points
                  </strong>
                  )
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    Track record on the SE4GD domain is evaluated in scale (No results = 0, Some results=5, Satisfactory results = 8, Good results=12, Excellent results = 16, Outstanding results=20))
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a644125 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a644125" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Selection interview and final selection
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-74a2764 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="74a2764" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 All short listed applicants will be interviewed through RecRight and the interview will be graded
                </p>
                <p>
                 The selection committee will produce a main selection list and reserve list based on the following criteria
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Pre-selection points (max 100 points)
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Interview points (max 40 points)
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 To be selected the student has to receive min 50% of the total points and need participate in the interview.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-05fcef9 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="05fcef9">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-070f1e5" data-element_type="column" data-id="070f1e5">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-adc847a elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="adc847a" data-widget_type="image.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <img alt="" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-1928" decoding="async" height="210" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Erasmulogo-1024x210.jpg" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Erasmulogo-1024x210.jpg 1024w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Erasmulogo-300x62.jpg 300w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Erasmulogo-768x158.jpg 768w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Erasmulogo-1536x315.jpg 1536w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Erasmulogo-2048x420.jpg 2048w" width="1024"/>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>

     <div class="ast-footer-overlay">

   const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-de2013e" data-element_type="column" data-id="de2013e">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-287532e elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="287532e" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Copy of your valid passport (ID is sufficient for EU residents)
                 </b>
                 (required)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3a0e236 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="3a0e236" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 A clear scan of the pages in your passport that contain your personal data. A copy of a passport (or ID) that is no longer valid cannot be accepted.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-81313ec elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="81313ec" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-c09b75b" data-element_type="column" data-id="c09b75b">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-61c2ec9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="61c2ec9" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Diploma(s)
                 </b>
                 (required)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-05e8dea elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="05e8dea" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 A
                 <b>
                  scan of the original Bachelor’s degree or certificate
                 </b>
                 and an
                 <b>
                  official translation in English
                 </b>
                 (when required).
                </p>
                <p>
                 An official translation must be one of the following:
                </p>
                <ol>
                 <li>
                  Issued by the awarding institution
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  An officially certified copy of a translation issued by the awarding institution
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Translated by an official translator
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  An officially certified copy of a translation made by an official translator
                 </li>
                </ol>
                <p>
                 Each page of an official translation must bear the translator’s stamp and/or signature. Official translations must be exact translations of the original documents; translations done by the applicant are not accepted
                </p>
                <p>
                 Will be used for evaluating your academic record.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <b>
                  Note
                 </b>
                 .
                 <em>
                  After the publication of admission results, the selected students must submit certified (attested) copies of the degree certificate and transcript of records by the given deadline. Admission is conditional until certified hard copies of the documents have been received. The conditionally granted study right will be cancelled if the certified documents are not received as requested. The certified documents will be compared to the electronic documents uploaded to the application portal.
                 </em>
                 <em>
                  During the application phase, SE4GD Admissions Office will also perform spot checks on educational documents with the issuing universities
                 </em>
                 .
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-4959fb5 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="4959fb5" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-7030667" data-element_type="column" data-id="7030667">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-da6c81a elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="da6c81a" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <strong>
                  Transcript of records
                 </strong>
                 (required)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a151943 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a151943" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 A
                 <strong>
                  list of grade
                 </strong>
                 s that your previous academic study/studies and an
                 <strong>
                  official translation
                 </strong>
                 in English (when required).
                </p>
                <p>
                 You must indicate your CGPA for your previous degree on your application form with two decimals or, calculate it if not indicated in the Degree Certificate or Transcript of Records.
                </p>
                <p>
                 If you have not yet completed your educational programme, please send temporary transcripts showing the grades you have received to date. In that case, please also send us a list of courses that are not on the temporary transcripts but that you will have to take to complete your programme. You need to finish the education programme and provide the degree certificate latest by the end of August.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Will be used for evaluating your academic record.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-7979486 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="7979486" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-d8d6ef0" data-element_type="column" data-id="d8d6ef0">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6f0c100 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="6f0c100" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Description of relevant courses of your previous higher education
                 </b>
                 (required)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-11f67eb elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="11f67eb" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 A list of the most relevant courses/modules in relation to the SE4GD programme contents, that were part of your Bachelor’s (and Master’s, if applicable) programme, with a short description of the contents of these courses. You can either copy this from a study guide or type a 5-10 line description for each relevant course if a study guide is not readily available.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Provide also the title of your thesis and abstract (or short description of the work).
                </p>
                <p>
                 Will be used for evaluating your academic record.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-826a791 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="826a791" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-dfbe037" data-element_type="column" data-id="dfbe037">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d6ecab3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="d6ecab3" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Language certificate
                 </b>
                 (required)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1378344 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1378344" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Language certificate is the other eligibility criteria for the application process. The admission requirements shows the requirements for the language certificate. If you do not fulfill the requirements you won’t get past the first screening.
                </p>
                <p>
                 SE4GD requires all applicants who have not completed their education in USA, UK, Ireland, New Zealand, Australia or Canada to provide us with an English language test score that meets the required minimum set for the programme . If you cannot yet provide us with a positive score yet, please register for a recognized English language test (IELTS tests, Cambridge tests, and TOEFL tests). We are  also accepting the TOEFL iBT Special Home Edition. The test is available everywhere that TOEFL iBT testing is normally available, with the exception of Mainland China and Iran.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-acb66d7 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="acb66d7" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-c890f37" data-element_type="column" data-id="c890f37">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-cf87402 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="cf87402" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <strong>
                  Additional educational documents
                 </strong>
                 (optional)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-4b64d96 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="4b64d96" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 You may have to upload additional educational documents under certain circumstances for example:
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Degree Certificate for your Master’s Degree and an official translation in English
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Transcript of Records for another degree or for additional university level studies (incl. Universities of Applied Sciences) and an official translation in English
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <div>
                 Can be used for evaluating your track record.
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-99bf215 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="99bf215" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-d8004e0" data-element_type="column" data-id="d8004e0">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-472a398 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="472a398" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Curriculum Vitae
                 </b>
                 (required)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7bc55a5 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="7bc55a5" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 A curriculum vitae that includes your personal details and lists your previous education and relevant work experience.
                 <a data-new-window="true" href="https://europass.cedefop.europa.eu/en/documents/curriculum-vitae/templates-instructions.iehtml" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" target="_blank">
                  A Europass CV template
                 </a>
                 is a preferred form of CV.
                </p>
                <p>
                 CV should list your achievements related to the SE4GD within your CV, such as
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Possible award, e.g. of your study success
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Additional course certificates (related to topics of SE4GD), e.g. certificates of MOOC courses
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Possible work certificates (related to topics of SE4GD)
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Publications (related to topics of SE4GD), if applicable
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 Used for evaluating your track record.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <b>
                  Note
                 </b>
                 . Make sure that in CV you clarify any residence type of visits (e.g. studies in UK or summer work in Germany) in EU area.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-3f2aef6 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="3f2aef6" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-82eda51" data-element_type="column" data-id="82eda51">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-8c84669 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="8c84669" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <strong>
                  Recommendation letters
                 </strong>
                 (optional)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-95a5e6e elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="95a5e6e" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 You may attach max. two recommendation letters. These recommendation letters can be from your academic supervisors or industry supervisors. Note, that it’s best if the recommendation letters are from persons that really know your achievements and strengths. And it is beneficial if the recommendation letters state your suitability to this program rather than being very general one.
                </p>
                <div>
                 Can be used for evaluating your track record.
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-3a49c0d elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="3a49c0d" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","stretch_section":"section-stretched"}'>
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-5e3b044" data-element_type="column" data-id="5e3b044">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-55a4f37 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="55a4f37" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Motivation letter
                 </b>
                 (required)
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f10016f elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="f10016f" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Motivation letter is the single most important document that you attach to the application. With carefully targeted motivation letter you convince us that you really want to get to this programme and you are deeply interested in the topics of the programme.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Good motivation letter
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Shows that you focus to this programme (it’s not a copy of a general motivation letter)
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Reflects to your perception towards the programme (both software engineering and sustainability)
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Shows how you want to develop in the field of the programme
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Is personal i.e. it emphasizes more of your own experiences and reflections than reflections found from academic literature.
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <div>
                 This letter is used for evaluating your motivation towards this programme. This letter is
                 <b>
                  max. 1 page
                 </b>
                 . Text over this one page limit will not be evaluated.
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">

             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7a5a6cd elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="7a5a6cd" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">

                <h6>
                 <b>

               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-9a95056 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="9a95056">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-d05eec4" data-element_type="column" data-id="d05eec4">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1f2f3d4 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1f2f3d4" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Application procedure
                 </b>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-200ce93 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="200ce93" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Follow these six steps during the SE4GD admission process. Note that you can complete the first two steps before our application period begins.
                </p>
                <ol>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Study our admission requirements
                  </strong>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Prepare for the admission
                  </strong>
                  <ol>
                   <li>
                    Take a language test (if required)
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Start collecting your application documents
                   </li>
                  </ol>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Fill in and submit the online application
                  </strong>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Submit
                  </strong>
                  <strong>
                   your language test scores
                  </strong>
                  (if required)
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   Monitor your e-mail
                  </strong>
                  for our message and complement your application (if required)
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  If your application was eligible and proceeded to the academic evaluation, wait for the selection results to be published
                 </li>
                </ol>
                <p>
                 See below for further information on each step.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-3b608c8 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="3b608c8">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-850f811" data-element_type="column" data-id="850f811">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-38ff7fd elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="38ff7fd" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <h3>
                  Step 1 – Study our admission requirements
                 </h3>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a9fa5ca elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a9fa5ca" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Before you begin the application process, check your compliance with our
                 <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                  <a href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/application-process/admissions-requirements/" style="color: #0000ff;">
                   admission requirements
                  </a>
                 </span>
                 .
                </p>
                <p>
                 NOTE: You cannot apply to the SE4GD programme if you have previously received Erasmus Mundus funding.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-85701ed elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="85701ed">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-995703e" data-element_type="column" data-id="995703e">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7a23dce elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="7a23dce" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <h3>
                  Step 2 – Prepare for the admission
                 </h3>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f75ca14 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="f75ca14" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 If an
                 <a data-wplink-edit="true" href="https://secclo.eu/admission/admission-requirements/">
                  English language test
                 </a>
                 is required from you and you have not taken the test yet,
                 <strong>
                  book a seat for it immediately. Applications without a valid English test result are not eligible and will not be processed further
                 </strong>
                 .
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-293d46b elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="293d46b">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-088f2d3" data-element_type="column" data-id="088f2d3">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-743fe3b elementor-widget elementor-widget-button" data-element_type="widget" data-id="743fe3b" data-widget_type="button.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="elementor-button-wrapper">
                 <a class="elementor-button elementor-button-link elementor-size-lg" href="https://se4gd.emundus.io/">
                  <span class="elementor-button-content-wrapper">
                   <span class="elementor-button-text">
                    To the application portal
                   </span>
                  </span>
                 </a>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ca5ff67 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ca5ff67" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 In application portal you should first register yourself (top right corner) and then login to start your preparing application.  Try to answer all questions with care and ask if you have any doubts. There are several mandatory elements to help our evaluation process.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-82049f0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="82049f0" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <h3>
                  Step 3 – Fill in and submit the online application
                 </h3>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d7f32cc elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="d7f32cc" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  Application portal will be open at the time of the application rounds. We have two rounds for each intake (cohort)
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                  </strong>
                  Applications for funded students (with a predefined set of scholarships) around December-January each year
                  <strong>
                   <br/>
                  </strong>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Applications for self-funded students around March-April each year
                  <b>
                   <br/>
                  </b>
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 Late applications will not be accepted, so submit your online application before the application deadline. Before submitting it, check the application and its attachments carefully.
                 <strong>
                  <br/>
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <p>
                 In the online application form, you will be asked about:
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  personal and contact information
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  previous education
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  motivation for the SE4GD studies
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  course descriptions of relevant courses taken
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  the scholarships you want to apply (incl. Erasmus Mundus scholarships)
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 In addition, you will be asked to upload all of your
                 <a href="https://secclo.eu/admission/application-documents/">
                  application documents
                 </a>
                 to the application portal. Try to have good quality electronic copies if possible.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <b>
                  NOTE! If you applied as funded student and did not get the study position and want to apply as self-funded student, the eMundus platform should give you a choice of using your previous application in the funded students call. Thus you do not have to set everything again. If that for some reason does not work let us know.
                 </b>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-abaed9d elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="abaed9d">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4afd4ca" data-element_type="column" data-id="4afd4ca">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-753377f elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="753377f" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <h3>
                  Step 4 – Submit your language test scores (if required)
                 </h3>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d9f53eb elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="d9f53eb" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 If an official English language test result is required from you (see Admission requirements
                 <em>
                  )
                 </em>
                 , how you should submit the test result for verification depends on the test taken.
                 <strong>
                  The deadline for the English language test result to be received by the SE4GD Admissions Office (SE4GD ( a t ) lut.fi) is
                  <br/>
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   For the funded students call – 31.1.2024
                  </strong>
                  .
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <b>
                   For the self-funded students spring 2024 (follow dates on our home page)
                   <br/>
                  </b>
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>

            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-e2d14e6" data-element_type="column" data-id="e2d14e6">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-4247fd0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="4247fd0" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Admission results
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-37eb9f3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="37eb9f3" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 All the applicants will be informed about the admission results when the student selection process has been carried out. The admission results will be published during April.
                 <b>
                  Applicants will have time until 15.4. to accept the scholarship and the study place
                 </b>
                 .
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-4d79e6f elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="4d79e6f">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-eab16be" data-element_type="column" data-id="eab16be">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-19ffc91 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="19ffc91" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <span>
                  One place per student provision
                 </span>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ebd58b3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ebd58b3" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 According to the one place per student -provision, a student may accept only one study place in Finland in a degree programme leading to a higher education degree during one academic year. The purpose is to ensure admission to higher education institutions for as many students as possible.
                </p>
                <p>
                 In addition, please note that you can only accept one study place in one EMJMD programme.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-a9d9680 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="a9d9680">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4b4d8ad" data-element_type="column" data-id="4b4d8ad">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a60bb4c elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a60bb4c" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 Accepting the study entitlement
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-26bb759 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="26bb759" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The admission results are delivered to applicants by email. Admitted applicants will receive an admission letter with instructions on how to accept the offered study entitlement. The offer must be accepted within the deadline stated in the admission letter. If the Student fails to do this, the offer will be automatically withdrawn.
                </p>
                <p>
                 The decision to accept (or reject) a study place is a binding choice, and you cannot cancel or change your choice later. When you accept a study place bindingly, all your other study programmes will automatically be cancelled. Please note that if you do not accept the study place in the SE4GD programme within the deadline, your study place and possible scholarship will be automatically withdrawn and transferred to the next student in line.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Please note that giving incorrect/false information or failing to provide the university with the required documentation will lead to direct cancellation of the admission.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-1a7e153 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="1a7e153">

          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-a4fd37e elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="a4fd37e">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-2792583" data-element_type="column" data-id="2792583">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5e57fca elementor-view-default elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon" data-element_type="widget" data-id="5e57fca" data-widget_type="icon.default">

                 <span style="color: #ff0000;">
                  <strong>

                 </span>
                </p>

            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-e2d14e6" data-element_type="column" data-id="e2d14e6">
