              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-4247fd0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="4247fd0" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  1. Verification at the time of accepted admittance
                 </b>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-37eb9f3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="37eb9f3" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 <span dir="ltr">
                  <strong>
                   HARD COPIES TO BE MAILED FOR THE DEGREE THAT YOU APPLIED WITH
                  </strong>
                  <br/>
                 </span>
                </p>
                <p>
                 <span dir="ltr">
                  If having applied with a finished degree completed in a country other than Finland the hard copies (not originals!!) for the following documents
                 </span>
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  <span dir="ltr">
                   <span class="ui-provider a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z ab ac ae af ag ah ai aj ak" dir="ltr">
                    Degree Certificate
                   </span>
                  </span>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <span class="ui-provider a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z ab ac ae af ag ah ai aj ak" dir="ltr">
                   Transcript of Records
                  </span>
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 <span class="ui-provider a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z ab ac ae af ag ah ai aj ak" dir="ltr">
                  must be provided according to the given specific instructions for the degree you had to apply with.
                  <br/>
                 </span>
                </p>
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  <span class="ui-provider a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z ab ac ae af ag ah ai aj ak" dir="ltr">
                   The required documents must be received according to the given instructions by
                  </span>
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   <span class="ui-provider a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z ab ac ae af ag ah ai aj ak" dir="ltr">
                    SE4GD Admissions Services at Lappeenranta Campus
                    <br/>
                   </span>
                  </strong>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  <strong>
                   <span class="ui-provider a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z ab ac ae af ag ah ai aj ak" dir="ltr">
                    by 31 July 2024 at 15:00 (UTC+3)
                   </span>
                  </strong>
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 <span class="ui-provider a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z ab ac ae af ag ah ai aj ak" dir="ltr">
                  The deadline is the same when providing us with the electronically verified documents by Digitary or by the awarding university.
                 </span>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2389dbd elementor-widget__width-initial elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="2389dbd" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h3>
                 <b>
                  A. Document authentication by mail
                 </b>
                </h3>
                <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                 You must be able to provide us with the hard copies for your Degree Certificate and Transcript of Records together with the official translations in English (when applicable) by mail, attested as requested in the country-specific requirements at Required Documents – Document Authentication – Country-Specific Requirements.
                 <span lang="EN-US">
                  <b>
                   The updated DL for LUT Admissions Services to receive the hard copies is July 31,  at 15:00 (UTC+3)
                  </b>
                  .
                 </span>
                 The mailing address is:
                </p>
                <p style="padding-left: 80px;">
                 LUT University/Susanna Koponen
                 <br/>
                 SE4GD Admissions Services
                 <br/>
                 Yliopistonkatu 34
                 <br/>
                 FI-53850 LAPPEENRANTA Finland
                 <br/>
                 Tel: +358 29 446 2111
                </p>
                <div>
                 <div title="Page 1">
                  <div>
                   <div>
                    <h3>
                     <b>
                      B. Providing us with electronically verified documents by Digitary
                     </b>
                    </h3>
                    <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                     If you are able to provide us with your educational documents that are electronically verified by Digitary, there is no official certification according to the country-specific requirements required.
                     <strong>
                      <span lang="EN-US">
                       The updated DL for LUT Admissions Services to receive the hard copies is July 31,  at 15:00 (UTC+3).
                       <br/>
                      </span>
                     </strong>
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6fac523 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="6fac523" data-widget_type="image.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <a href="https://www.digitary.net/">
                 <img alt="" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-1436" decoding="async" fetchpriority="high" height="159" sizes="(max-width: 318px) 100vw, 318px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Ditary.png" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Ditary.png 318w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Ditary-300x150.png 300w" width="318"/>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d2f9639 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="d2f9639" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div>
                 <h3>
                  <b>
                   1.1. Degree completed in a country with
                   <a href="https://www.lut.fi/en/studies/apply-lut/applying-masters-programmes/country-specific-requirements-document-authentication">
                    <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                     country-specific requirements
                    </span>
                   </a>
                   for document authentication
                  </b>
                 </h3>
                 <div>
                  <div title="Page 1">
                   <div>
                    <div>
                     <ul>
                      <li>
                       For
                       <strong>
                        Bangladesh, China, Iran and Pakistan
                       </strong>
                       , there is a special way of attesting both the copy for your Degree Certificate and the copy for your Transcript of Records – please carefully follow the instructions given at Country-Specific Requirements.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       For
                       <strong>
                        All African countries, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Nepal, Vietnam and Sri Lanka
                       </strong>
                       , there is a detailed way of mailing the official Transcript of Records to LUT University directly by the awarding university plus, getting the copy for the Degree Certificate either
                       <b>
                        officially certified by the awarding university
                       </b>
                       or, getting it attested by you through a special process called
                       <b>
                        legalisation
                       </b>
                       . Please carefully follow the instructions given at Country-Specific Requirements and Document Authentication.
                      </li>
                      <li style="list-style-type: none;">
                      </li>
                     </ul>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-11b299f elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="11b299f">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-12ff2a7" data-element_type="column" data-id="12ff2a7">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-52388a2 elementor-widget-divider--view-line elementor-widget elementor-widget-divider" data-element_type="widget" data-id="52388a2" data-widget_type="divider.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="elementor-divider">
                 <span class="elementor-divider-separator">
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-a9d9680 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="a9d9680">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-9bbcc96" data-element_type="column" data-id="9bbcc96">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a6b92e4 elementor-view-default elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a6b92e4" data-widget_type="icon.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="elementor-icon-wrapper">
                 <div class="elementor-icon">
                  <i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-info">
                  </i>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4b4d8ad" data-element_type="column" data-id="4b4d8ad">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a60bb4c elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a60bb4c" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Official Certification
                 </b>
                 <b>
                  or Digital credentials
                 </b>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-26bb759 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="26bb759" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div title="Page 2">
                 <div>
                  <div>
                   <p>
                    The official certification can be done either by the
                    <b>
                     awarding institution
                    </b>
                    or through a special process called
                    <b>
                     legalisation
                    </b>
                    .
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    <b>
                     1. Official Certification by the Awarding Institution
                    </b>
                   </p>
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    Officially certified copies for the educational documents can be issued by the awarding institution.
                   </p>
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    When requesting officially certified copies from the awarding institution, make sure that the copies submitted meet the following criteria:
                   </p>
                   <ul>
                    <li style="list-style-type: none;">
                     <ul>
                      <li>
                       The copies are taken directly from your original educational documents
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The copies include every page of your educational documents
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The copies bear the original stamp of the awarding institution on each page of the document
                       <ul>
                        <li>
                         A generic stamp stating only “Certified true copy” will not be accepted.
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Bear the original signature of the certifying officer
                      </li>
                     </ul>
                    </li>
                   </ul>
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    Plain and simple regular photocopies taken from the certified copies without any official certification on the photocopies will not be accepted.
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    <strong>
                     2. Official Certification by Legalisation
                    </strong>
                   </p>
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    <b>
                     If not able to have your educational documents officially certified by the awarding institution, you can get them officially certified through a process called legalisation
                    </b>
                    , which is diveded into two different methods depending on whether the country where the degree was awarded is a signatory to the Hague Convention of 1961 or not.
                   </p>
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    For more information on the signatory countries for the Hague Convention of 1961 and the authorities issuing Apostille Certificates, please see
                    <span style="color: #0000ff;">
                     <a href="https://www.hcch.net/en/instruments/conventions/authorities1/?cid=41" style="color: #0000ff;">
                      Convention of 5 October 1961 Abolishing the Requirement of Legalisation for Foreign Public Documents
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    .
                   </p>
                   <div class="page" title="Page 3">
                    <div class="layoutArea">
                     <div class="column">
                      <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                       A. Apostille
                      </p>
                      <p style="padding-left: 80px;">
                       Apostille Certificate is required, if the degree has been awarded in a country that is a signatory of the Hague Convention of 1961. The Apostille Certificate can be done by stamping the document with a specific Apostille stamp or, on a separate Apostille Certificate.
                      </p>
                      <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                       B. Legalisation
                      </p>
                      <p style="padding-left: 80px;">
                       Legalisation is required, if the degree has been awarded in a country that is not a signatory of the Hague Convention of 1961. The document must be first legalised by the Foreign Ministry of the degree-awarding country. After that, the document must be legalised again by a Finnish Embassy or Consulate to that country having done the first legalisation.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div class="page" title="Page 3">
                      <div class="layoutArea">
                       <div class="column">
                        <p>
                         <b>
                          3. Digital Credentials by Digitary
                         </b>
                        </p>
                        <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                         If you are able to provide us with your educational documents that are electronically verified by Digitary, there is no official certification otherwise required.
                        </p>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-ec690a3 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="ec690a3">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-8e300a2" data-element_type="column" data-id="8e300a2">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a77034e elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a77034e" data-widget_type="image.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <a href="https://www.digitary.net/">
                 <img alt="" class="attachment-large size-large wp-image-1436" decoding="async" fetchpriority="high" height="159" sizes="(max-width: 318px) 100vw, 318px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Ditary.png" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Ditary.png 318w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Ditary-300x150.png 300w" width="318"/>
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-6002668 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="6002668">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-1419caa" data-element_type="column" data-id="1419caa">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6a2bee0 elementor-view-default elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon" data-element_type="widget" data-id="6a2bee0" data-widget_type="icon.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="elementor-icon-wrapper">
                 <div class="elementor-icon">
                  <i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-info">
                  </i>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-44dde73" data-element_type="column" data-id="44dde73">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a4601e3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a4601e3" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Official translations
                 </b>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f21ea85 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="f21ea85" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="page" title="Page 3">
                 <div class="layoutArea">
                  <div class="column">
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    Whenever the original educational documents are not issued in English/Finnish/Swedish, official translations in English are required in addition to the documents in original language.
                   </p>
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    An official translation must be one of the following:
                   </p>
                   <ol>
                    <li style="list-style-type: none;">
                     <ol>
                      <li>
                       Issued by the awarding institution
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       An officially certified copy of a translation issued by the awarding institution
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Translated by an official translator
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       An officially certified copy of a translation made by an official translator
                      </li>
                     </ol>
                    </li>
                   </ol>
                   <p style="padding-left: 40px;">
                    Each page of an official translation must bear the translator’s stamp and/or signature. Official translations must be exact translations of the original documents; translations done by the applicant are not accepted.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-8827178 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="8827178">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-861cdf4" data-element_type="column" data-id="861cdf4">

   const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>

}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);

}

               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 <b>
                  Once again congratulations on being selected to the SE4GD programme
                 </b>
                 !
                </p>
                <p>
                 On this page, you will find important information on what steps you have to take after being selected to the SE4GD programme and what you should do when arriving in Italy for the first semester studies at
                 <a href="https://www.univaq.it/en/">
                  Universita degli Studi dell’Aquila (UnivAQ).
                 </a>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Please read the information carefully.
                </p>

           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-eab16be" data-element_type="column" data-id="eab16be">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-19ffc91 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="19ffc91" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <strong>
                  1. Accept your study place, and thus the possible EMJMD scholarship, at the eMundus portal
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ebd58b3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ebd58b3" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Please note that
                 <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
                  you may
                 </span>
                 <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
                  only accept one study place
                 </span>
                 leading to a higher education degree in Finland per term. If you have applied to more than one programme, in Finland you should check the status of your applications for all programmes before accepting this offer. Accepting a study place is a binding choice, and you cannot cancel or change your choice later. When you accept a study place bindingly, all your other study programmes will automatically be cancelled.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Note that if you do not accept the study place in the SE4GD programme within the deadline, your study place and possible scholarship will be automatically withdrawn and transferred to a student on the waiting list.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-a9d9680 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="a9d9680">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4b4d8ad" data-element_type="column" data-id="4b4d8ad">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a60bb4c elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="a60bb4c" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <strong>
                  2. Send your academic documents following
                  <a href="https://www.master-ediss.eu/index.php/country-specific-requirements/">
                   the country-specific requirements
                  </a>
                  ,
                 </strong>
                 if applicable, to the SE4GD programme office as soon as possible. You must make sure that the documents arrive to the SE4GD programme office by the latest of August 31st at 15:00 (Helsinki time).
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-26bb759 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="26bb759" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 <span style="color: #201f1e; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">
                  Please read the instructions carefully:
                 </span>
                 <a data-auth="NotApplicable" data-linkindex="2" href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/admitted-students/authenticating-documents/" rel="noopener noreferrer" style="font-style: normal; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-weight: 400; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 14.6667px; line-height: inherit; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #0563c1; text-decoration-line: underline; background-color: #ffffff;" target="_blank">
                  https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/admitted-students/authenticating-documents/
                 </a>
                 <span style="color: #201f1e; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">
                  and for the country specific instructions:
                 </span>
                 <a data-auth="NotApplicable" data-linkindex="3" href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/application-process/country-specific-requirements/" rel="noopener noreferrer" style="font-style: normal; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-weight: 400; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 14.6667px; line-height: inherit; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #0563c1; text-decoration-line: underline; background-color: #ffffff;" target="_blank">
                  https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/application-process/country-specific-requirements/
                 </a>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-8ac97af elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="8ac97af">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-e50af15" data-element_type="column" data-id="e50af15">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-da4c3e3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="da4c3e3" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  3
                 </b>
                 .
                 <strong>
                  Apply for a 2-year residence permit
                 </strong>
                 (non-EU/EEA citizens).
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c7e9cd0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="c7e9cd0" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p class="x_MsoListParagraph" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 36pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #201f1e; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">
                 <span lang="EN-US" style="font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: inherit; color: inherit;">
                  You are advised to start the
                  <b>
                   Student residence permit, Mobility periods to Italy and Netherlands
                  </b>
                  , and visa procedure only after you receive all the documents from us, not earlier, as they will not process incomplete applications.
                 </span>
                </p>
                <p class="x_MsoListParagraph" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 36pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #201f1e; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">
                 <span lang="EN-US" style="font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: inherit; color: inherit;">
                  <a data-auth="NotApplicable" data-linkindex="4" href="https://migri.fi/en/residence-permit-application-for-studies" rel="noopener noreferrer" style="font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: inherit; color: #0563c1; text-decoration-line: underline;" target="_blank">
                   https://migri.fi/en/residence-permit-application-for-studies
                  </a>
                  Please wait for the instructions and documents patiently.
                 </span>
                </p>
                <p class="x_MsoListParagraph" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0cm 36pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #201f1e; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400;">
                 <span lang="EN-US" style="font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: inherit; color: inherit;">
                 </span>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-d20fff1 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="d20fff1">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-ed26ad4" data-element_type="column" data-id="ed26ad4">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6bcfd90 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="6bcfd90" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  4.
                 </b>
                 <strong>
                  Apply for accommodation.
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0d6b1b1 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="0d6b1b1" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 In SE4GD you will travel through different countries and that naturally creates the need (and stress) of having new housing for each country and thus new processes. SE4GD local personnel will help you in these processes.
                </p>
                <p>
                 The accommondation in general is either in student apartments or in private apartments. Typical apartments are shared so that everyone has their own room with a shared facilities (kitchen, restroom within the apartment and laundry room for the whole house). In Lappeenranta, Finland apartments are typically shared among 2 persons. There might also be some 3 person apartments.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-b45ecb0 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="b45ecb0">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-2c68ac0" data-element_type="column" data-id="2c68ac0">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e9b4101 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="e9b4101" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  5
                 </b>
                 .
                 <strong>
                  Plan your travel to Italy
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d100c17 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="d100c17" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 The other thing the distributed nature of SE4GD brings to you is the arrangement of travels between semesters.SE4GD aims to plan the semesters so that it’s as fluent as possible to move from one location to another.
                </p>
                <p>
                 Naturally the most important travel you need to arrange is from your home country to Italy for the first semester. We propose that you plan the arrival early enough to get familiarized to the area and culture. We plan to arrange welcoming week for the students to get familiar with each other before the actual courses start.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-de1d7db elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="de1d7db">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-e65db42" data-element_type="column" data-id="e65db42">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e863fdb elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="e863fdb" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  6
                 </b>
                 .
                 <strong>
                  For self-funding students
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6c07e94 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="6c07e94" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Pay the participation cost for the first academic year in the SE4GD programme (either in one or two instalments). Please see more instructions in the admission letter.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-4f56e4d elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="4f56e4d">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4beddaa" data-element_type="column" data-id="4beddaa">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-321ecce elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="321ecce" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  7
                 </b>
                 .
                 <strong>
                  Enroll as present for the academic year in Italy
                 </strong>
                 <strong>
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-972022d elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="972022d" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Each university, while studying there, requires you to enroll as present student. The registration may require some small student union fees (SE4GD programme takes care but you might have to pay those in the first place by yourself) and through this may provide student health care service (e.g. in LUT).
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-a3f9ec7 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="a3f9ec7">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-a25ac99" data-element_type="column" data-id="a25ac99">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ba26e87 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ba26e87" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  8
                 </b>
                 .
                 <strong>
                  Check your email regularly for additional information
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3f38426 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="3f38426" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 Please note that all information will be communicated to the email address that you have given in your online application. Thus, please notify the SE4GD programme office in case you change your email address. There will also be mailing list for all the accepted students that is linked (at the moment) to your email address you gave while applying to the SE4GD programme.
                </p>
                <p>
                 You will also be assigned a student tutor closer to the start of the academic year
                 <strong>
                  .
                 </strong>
                 We encourage you to be in contact with your tutor as s/he can help you with practicalities when arriving to different countries.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-bbc21d1 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="bbc21d1">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4fa04be" data-element_type="column" data-id="4fa04be">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5fe5160 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="5fe5160" data-widget_type="image.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">

}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);

}

	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

   const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

.envato-block__preview{

.envato-kit-139-accordion .elementor-widget-container{

}
.envato-kit-139-map iframe,
.envato-kit-139-slider .slick-slide,

					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );

                <div class="elementor-shortcode">
                 <div class="everest-tab-main-wrapper etab-sc-main-wrapper etab-clearfix etab-group-wrap etab-sp-custom-1180 etab-template1 etab-trigger-on_click etab-horizontal etab-top-left-position" data-tab_trigger_type="on_click" id="et-tab-random-417890612">
