                  <div class="etab-content-wrap">
                   <div class="etab-content-section etab-417890612 etab-3tOO0OrCNm-417890612" data-active="0">
                    <div class="etab-editor-content clearfix">
                     <div>
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/UDA-Logo.jpg" width="150px"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       UnivAQ (IT)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       UnivAQ has a long tradition in Software Engineering research and development. Thanks to its competence, the Software Engineering and Architecture Group has been invited to nationally strategic programs, such as the model-driven re-engineering of the Rete Italiana Ferroviaria (RFI -the Italian railways infrastructure manager) system, as well as the Uffizi Galleries system engineering.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/download.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       LUT (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       LUT University places a strong emphasis on sustainable development. Both the former Trailblazers strategy and the recently published System Earth strategy mandate that every program and research team integrates sustainability considerations into their work. The Software Engineering department has been blending software engineering with sustainability for the past seven years. SE4GD further strengthens and reinforces this approach.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/VU_logo-1.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       VUA (NL)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       VUA has been focusing on Connected World and Science for Sustainability themes. As digitalization and globalization bring people closer to each other it is important that we can voice our social worries, including sustainable future, which differ based on our past, language, religion, or culture. This fits nicely with the goals of SE4GD in which we give a voice to the people, and citizens.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="etab-content-section etab-417890612 etab-l7VfJgWOVn-417890612" data-active="0">
                    <div class="etab-editor-content clearfix">
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Chalmers-Logo.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       CHALMERS (SE)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Chalmers University of Technology conducts research and offers education in technology, science, architecture, and maritime engineering. Making an impact for a sustainable future.
                       <br/>
                       We educate for the future and create social benefits through our research that is brought to life and implemented in close cooperation with businesses and industry.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/AU-300x202-1.jpg" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       AAU (DK)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Aalborg University (AAU) is characterized by problem-oriented project work. The Aalborg problem-based learning (PBL) model is recognized internationally, and UNESCO has placed its only Danish chair for PBL at Aalborg University.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/banner_hfu_logo.jpg" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       HFU (DE)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       As one of Germany’s leading universities, Furtwangen University (HFU) is recognized for its excellence in the following areas: engineering, computer science, information systems and management, business administration and engineering, media, international business, and health. Furtwangen University’s core focus is on employment-oriented education and training based on academic principles. We actively support cooperation between our university and partner companies in the area of applied research and technology transfer as it is an essential catalyst for innovation and the sustained relevance of our teaching. Traditional boundaries between subject fields are removed in interdisciplinary projects. Social responsibility, sustainability, and the safeguarding of our future are at the forefront of our goals. We provide our students with the necessary skills for forward-looking, sustainable action in industry, the environment, and in society as a whole.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/LogoHSHarzsmall.jpg" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       HARZ (DE)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       HARZ has focused on its research on energy issues in home and building environments. Homes aggregate close to 30% of energy consumption in EU21 and, as such, having efficient software solutions that affect human behavior will have a big effect.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/UDC-Logo-540x540-1.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       UDC (ES)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The University of A Coruña is committed to the creation, development, communication, and critical analysis of science, technology, and culture. As part of its duty of service to society, the transfer, dissemination, and promotion of knowledge are important activities for the advancement of culture, quality of life, and economic development of the Galician region.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/USP-Logo.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       USP (ES)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       University of São Paulo (USP) is the major Brazilian institution of higher learning and research and has for many years been one of the best ranked Graduate Program in Mathematics and Computer Sciences in Brazil.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Universitat_Ramon_Llull_logo_catala.jpg" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       URL (ES)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       La Salle is an institution with a history spanning over 300 years, with a strong international presence. They are pioneers in offering studies that are continually adapting to the needs of the market and society in general. La Salle is strongly committed to providing quality education with values for the young people of tomorrow, as we believe that in society, people should come first.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div>
                      <p>
                       <img alt="" class="wp-image-2252 alignleft" decoding="async" height="97" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 148px) 100vw, 148px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logousc_.jpg" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logousc_.jpg 901w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logousc_-300x196.jpg 300w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logousc_-768x501.jpg 768w" width="148"/>
                       USC (ES)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The University of Santiago de Compostela (USC, 1495), hosts ~25,000 undergraduate students and more than 3,000 PhD students. Research and Technology Development is one of the most important activities in USC with more than 250 research teams offering a high-quality scientific production in different areas. The USC has participated in more than 70 FP7 projects and is currently involved in 15 H2020 projects.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Being recognized as the International Campus of Excellence for the Campus Life strategic research program (Spanish Ministry of Education and Science), Campus Life defines and contributes to the development of a new model of sustainable economic and social growth based on talent, innovation, and internationalization.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p>
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="etab-content-section etab-417890612 etab-active-content etab-iNAfOS4x5G-417890612" data-active="1">
                    <div class="etab-editor-content clearfix">
                     <div>
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/unnamed.png" width="150px"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Abloy
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Abloy is part of ASSA ABLOY, which is the global leader in access control solutions. The products and solutions include electromechanical locking and mobile keys, access management software, services, electric and mechanical locking, lock cases, architectural hardware, and door control products. Abloy is committed to sustainability in all its operations.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Arvo
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Arvo Laboratoriot is the newest and the biggest commercial Finnish laboratory sector consortium that has just started to provide highly reliable laboratory services for healthcare business area companies and public sector healthcare units.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/cgi-copy.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        CGI
                       </strong>
                       (NE)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       CGI is among the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world. Operating across the globe, CGI delivers end-to-end capabilities, from strategic IT and business consulting to systems integration, managed IT and business process services and intellectual property solutions, helping clients achieve their goals, including becoming customer-centric digital enterprises.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Concria
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Concria is a company known as the original creator of Europe’s first trowel polishing system and is interested in the use of digitalization to improve the business sector.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/dhl-logo.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        DHL
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       DHL is the leading Finnish sustainability-focused logistics and warehousing operations partner for a multitude of Finnish companies with wide global interconnections to all DHL units around the globe. DHL has the goal of reducing the logistics services emissions to zero.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p>
                      <
                     </p>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150px" src="http://placekitten.com/g/200/200" width="150px"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        DHS
                       </strong>
                       (DE)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       DHS-Computertechnik GmbH is a company developing solutions for building automation, especially combining several technologies available on the market by the use of open source stacks.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       Fleet Innovation
                      </strong>
                      (FI)
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Fleet Innovation is a company using highly efficient data-driven business models for sustainable solutions in the B2B vehicle fleet management context. The Fleet Innovation service enables minimizing the number of vehicles the customers need to maximize the usage of those vehicles to promote sustainability and efficiency in fleet management.
                     </p>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/download.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Hub Logistics
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Hub Logistics is a company focusing on high-added value services, more efficient 3rd party logistics operations, and less pollution and waste-generating operations enhancements for our customers.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/0.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Kemppi
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Kemppi is a pioneering company within the welding industry. “It is our role to develop solutions that make you win business”.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p>
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/download-1.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Seepia
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Seepia Games Oy is regarded as the “go-to partner” by most of our clients for both professionalism and our rapid development rate of high-quality projects. Our fast, nimble, and efficient team specializes in top-quality playable ads, Google Play instants, and instant games with a focus on HTML and Unity platforms.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/images.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Sensire
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Sensire is a Finnish company facilitating and simplifying quality assurance and HACCP processes through highly technical IoT solutions. Our partners use our expertise to drive sustainable development efforts in a number of specialist applications, improve their productivity, and reduce waste.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        StoraEnso
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       StoraEnso is the oldest limited liability company in the world and has multiple corporate divisions and business units, e.g. Packaging Solutions, Biomaterials, Wood Products, and Paper. StoraEnso cares for the used resources and raw materials and aims to use digitalization for the improvement of the processes.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/205846_Logo-VandebronV3.jpg" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Vandebron
                       </strong>
                       (NE)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Vandebron is a tech-enabled smart energy platform that makes energy markets fairer, more transparent, and more sustainable for private clients and companies. Vandebron believes in a future of increasingly de-centrally produced green energy, creating an expanding and complex variety of supply options for prosumers.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <img alt="" class="wp-image-2248 alignleft" decoding="async" height="25" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 145px) 100vw, 145px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logo_promatis_300_rgb_10cm.png" srcset="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logo_promatis_300_rgb_10cm.png 1181w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logo_promatis_300_rgb_10cm-300x52.png 300w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logo_promatis_300_rgb_10cm-1024x177.png 1024w, https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/logo_promatis_300_rgb_10cm-768x133.png 768w" width="145"/>
                      <strong>
                       PROMATIS
                      </strong>
                      (GE)
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <span lang="EN-US">
                       Companies aiming for sustainable process improvements are looking for a competent partner who thinks far beyond the IT solution. Specifically, the experts at PROMATIS have been understanding and mastering complex business processes for more than 25 years and have been developing solutions for profitable business optimization and automation – with a holistic understanding and profound know-how. In close cooperation with leading research institutes, PROMATIS repeatedly succeeds as a leader in introducing innovative methods and software tools. Also on the way to digital economy, customers benefit from PROMATIS’ Business Process Management (BPM) competence, in collaboration with Horus. As part of it process mining is an integral component of the PROMATIS service portfolio for Business Process Excellence.
                      </span>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="etab-content-section etab-417890612 etab-v3WBH3mn8B-417890612" data-active="0">
                    <div class="etab-editor-content clearfix">
                     <div>
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150px" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/lpr_logo4.jpg" width="150px"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       City of Lappeenranta (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The City of Lappeenranta is one of the leading municipalities in Finland in terms of sustainable solutions. One of our strategy’s goals is to become the leading city in renewable energy and green technology. Lappeenranta was awarded the Green Leaf City award for 2021. Lappeenranta is also the city for the main campus of LUT University.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" class="alignleft" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/imatra_tunnus_vaaka_web.jpg" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       City of Imatra (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The City of Imatra is a neighboring city to Lappeenranta and an active collaborator with LUT University. The City of Imatra is especially interested in utilizing digitalization and industry 4.0 approaches to boost sustainable service development.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        City of Lahti
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The City of Lahti is the capital city of the region Päijät-Häme and the location of the second main campus of LUT University. We want to develop our urban and neighboring suburban areas in a sustainable manner and in fact Lahti’s vision is to be a boldly green city on a global scale. The City of Lahti has been awarded the title of Europen Green Capital 2021 by the European Commission.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Ministry of Transportation and Communication
                       </strong>
                       (FI)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The Ministry of Transportation and Communications is part of the Finnish government and is responsible for ICT infrastructure and service development. Lately, this ministry has focused, among other issues, on the environmental and climate effects of ICT and is keen on developing this area further.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p>
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="etab-content-section etab-417890612 etab-NtLEKk6Fw5-417890612" data-active="0">
                    <div class="etab-editor-content clearfix">
                     <div>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Sunway university
                       </strong>
                       (MY)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Sunway University has the vision to be a world-class university by nurturing all-around individuals and devoting the university to the discovery, advancement, transmission and application of knowledge that meets the needs of the society and the global community.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Nepal Engineering College
                       </strong>
                       (NP)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Nepal Engineering College is the first engineering college established in 1994 as a non-profit institute taking care of education and research in Engineering, architecture and other allied fields in Nepal. The vision of NEC is to evolve as the center of higher learning, excelling in academics through continued engagements in education and research.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham
                       </strong>
                       (IN)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Amrita is the #1 private university in India (THE 2020), and has been recommended for the “Institute of Eminence” status on par with some very old and reputed institutions in India. Amrita offers programmes all the way to doctoral level in Engineering, Business, Medicine & Healthcare, Biotechnology, Art&Sciences, Education, Social work and Ayurveda.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Jordan University of Science and Technology
                       </strong>
                       (JO)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Jordan University of Science and Technology (JUST) is a public university which provides a wide range of advanced degree programs in Jordan. At the moment the university comprises 12 faculties and 84 departments offering 42 undergraduate programs and 96 postgraduate programs.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        University of Namibia
                       </strong>
                       (NA)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       UNAM is a young and dynamic university established in 1992 having a vision to be a sustainable international hub of excellence in higher education, training, research and innovation by 2030. The special emphasis UNAM has towrds  SE4GD is related to building local and regional capacities for Software Development, with the purpose of addressing socio-technical challenges in low income communities.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration
                       </strong>
                       (GH)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration (GIMPA) was established in 1961 as a joint Ghana government and United Nations special funded project. The institute has been been accredited by National accreditation board of Ghana to run undergraduate and graduate programmes and executive and professional training programmes.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        United States International University – Africa
                       </strong>
                       (KE)
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p>
                       USIA – Africa was founded in 1969 and it is the oldest private sector university in the region with dual accreditation, in Kenya and in USA. The university is highly developmental focusing with five areas of strength: non-profit private university offering affordable education; strong information technology infrastructure and processes supporting students to prepare the ever changing technological environment; systems monitoring and ensuring educational effectiveness; commitment to quality and improvement of student learning; and strategic directions for sustainability.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Council for Scientific and Industrial Research
                       </strong>
                       (ZA)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       CSIR is a leading scientific and technology research organization that researches, develops, localizes, and diffuses technologies to accelerate socioeconomic regional prosperity in South Africa.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p style="float: left">
                       <img border="1px" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/USP-Logo.png" width="150"/>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        University of São Paulo
                       </strong>
                       (ES)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       University of São Paulo (USP) is the major Brazilian institution of higher learning and research and has for many years one of the best ranked Graduate Program in Mathematics and Computer Sciences in Brazil.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div style="clear: left">
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Universidad de la Republica en Uruguay
                       </strong>
                       (UY)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The computer science institute of the Universidad de la Republica en Urugyay takes care of teaching and research in the computer science domain and especially in Software Engineering.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Universidad Nacional de San Agustin de Arequipa
                       </strong>
                       (PE)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       UNSA is an organization dedicated to the development of academics and professionals with the capacity to research, create and disseminate knowledge. We strive to contribute to the preservation of the environment, the growth and social development, and to promote equity, security and justice.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Carnegie Mellon University
                       </strong>
                       (US)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       CMU has was expertise on software engineering. Dr. Schmerl is an expert in software architecture design, and trade-off analysis, including qualities associated with sustainability.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                      </p>
                     </div>

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

   const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	left:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-left:0px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	right:-25px !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.32);
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-next:before{
	display:block;
	margin-top:-5px;
	margin-right:-5px;
	transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
}

.envato-kit-66-orangetext{
	color:#f4511e;
}

.envato-kit-66-countdown .elementor-countdown-label{
	display:inline-block !important;
	border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
	padding:9px 20px;
}

/** Start Block Kit CSS: 69-3-4f8cfb8a1a68ec007f2be7a02bdeadd9 **/

.envato-kit-66-menu .e--pointer-framed .elementor-item:before{
	border-radius:1px;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper{
	position:relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit{
	position:static;
}

.envato-kit-66-subscription-form .elementor-form-fields-wrapper .elementor-field-type-submit button{
	position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 6px;
    transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-moz-transform: translate(0, -50%);
		-webmit-transform: translate(0, -50%);
}

.envato-kit-66-testi-slider .elementor-testimonial__footer{
	margin-top: -60px !important;
	z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}

.envato-kit-66-featured-slider .elementor-slides .slick-prev{
	width:50px;
	height:50px;
	background-color:#ffffff !important;
	transform:rotate(45deg);
	-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);

								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );

								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );

					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );

				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',

          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-00e05ab elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="00e05ab">

           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-26cc422 elementor-invisible" data-element_type="column" data-id="26cc422" data-settings='{"animation":"slideInLeft"}'>
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-be95c0c elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="be95c0c" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Get to know the event!
                 </b>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1748b93 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1748b93" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  SE4GD Summer School 2024
                 </strong>
                 is an on-site event held by the Erasmus Mundus Master program
                 <a href="https://se4gd.lutsoftware.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  <span style="color: rgba(137, 180, 85, 1);">
                   SE4GD
                  </span>
                 </a>
                 in Santiago de Compostela (Spain).
                </p>
                <p>
                 Our goal for the SE4GD summer school 2024 is to explore the intersection of software engineering, sustainability, and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to address the pressing challenges facing society.
                </p>
                <p>
                 By leveraging the strong foundation and technological advancements of software engineering and integrating sustainability principles into the development of AI-based systems, we aim to empower participants to create innovative solutions that not only propel technological advancement but also foster positive impacts across environmental, economic, social and individual dimensions of software sustainability.
                </p>
                <p>
                 The language of the Summer School is English, and the program consists of invited talks from academia and industry in the context of the SE4GD Erasmus Mundus project.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-9fde2c6 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="9fde2c6">
           <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-c47988a" data-element_type="column" data-id="c47988a">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d0b597f elementor-widget__width-initial elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-element_type="widget" data-id="d0b597f" data-widget_type="image.default">

					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];

				} );

            <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-66 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-9c82655" data-element_type="column" data-id="9c82655">
             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5d6a054 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="5d6a054" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Ruben Huygens
                 </b>
                 <br/>
                 Netherlands
                 <img alt="🇭🇰" decoding="async" height="50" role="img" src="https://img.icons8.com/?size=100&id=7Rco5PqWIoaC&format=png&color=000000" style="font-size: 15px" width="50"/>
                 <span style="font-size: 15px;font-style: normal;font-weight: 400">
                 </span>
                </h3>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-53e4b73 elementor-widget elementor-widget-wp-widget-text" data-element_type="widget" data-id="53e4b73" data-widget_type="wp-widget-text.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="textwidget">
                 <p>
                  With a semester in Italy and another semester in Finland behind me, I can say that I have zero regrets about my decision to join SE4GD. My months in Italy were some of the most incredible months of my life. For the first time in my life, I got to live outside my country of birth and to do that in the most beautiful country in Europe—Italy. I also got to meet people from all over the world, each of them incredibly kind and filled with stories about places unknown to my limited worldview. I greatly enjoyed the random conversations with my flatmates, the hikes, and the board game bar nights. All that, of course, besides the technical curriculum offered by Università degli Studio dell’Aquila. Over the Christmas break, we moved to Finland, which was dark, cold, and quiet at first but slowly broke out of that state to unfold into beautiful landscapes and temperatures warmer than Italy’s. During one course at LUT we worked with companies, where I learned most about the software engineering process and sustainability reporting. I also became a confident presenter at some of the many initiatives for entrepreneurial skills offered by LUT and partners. As I write this, the semester in Lappeenranta is almost at an end, but I look forward to the next one in the Netherlands.
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>

            </div>
           </div>

                <div class="textwidget">
                 <p>
                  Studying in the SE4GD Erasmus Mundus program has been a transformative experience. I have had the incredible opportunity to study at top universities across Europe, learning from leading experts in software engineering and sustainability. The program’s multidisciplinary approach has not only deepened my technical skills but also heightened my awareness of the critical role software can play in achieving environmental goals. The diverse international community and collaborative projects have enriched my understanding and broadened my perspective, preparing me to contribute meaningfully to the European Green Deal and global sustainability efforts.

               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Esther Oluwatomi Adenekan
                 </b>
                 <br/>
                 Nigeria
                 <img alt="🇳🇬" class="" decoding="async" height="50" loading="lazy" role="img" src="https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f1f3-1f1ec.svg" style="font-size: 15px" width="50"/>
                 <span style="font-size: 15px;font-style: normal;font-weight: 400">
                 </span>
                </h3>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-08679c0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-wp-widget-text" data-element_type="widget" data-id="08679c0" data-widget_type="wp-widget-text.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="textwidget">
                 <p>
                  Two months down the line, all I can say is that, the experience has been amazing. I have never experienced so much diversity and cultural awareness as this. I have made new friends, visited new places and I still have a long list of places to visit! To cap it all, I’ve got some of the most beautiful souls as classmates, everyone working as a team, ensuring that no one is left behind.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  To new applicants, I would say, Never think you don’t have an experience to qualify for this scholarship, read about sustainability and green ict, then think about how your past studies, internship or work experience can be aligned to this. Also pay special attention to the application requirements on the website. Give it your best shot, the Erasmus experience is worth your application time. Prepare your mind for a world of endless opportunities and possibilities.
                 </p>

             <div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ab94dba elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="ab94dba" data-widget_type="heading.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                 <b>
                  Abdul Qadir Ahmed Abbasi
                 </b>
                 <br/>
                 Pakistan
                 <img alt="🇵🇰" class="" decoding="async" height="50" loading="lazy" role="img" src="https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f1f5-1f1f0.svg" style="font-size: 15px" width="50"/>
                </h3>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-248b3d6 elementor-widget elementor-widget-wp-widget-text" data-element_type="widget" data-id="248b3d6" data-widget_type="wp-widget-text.default">
               <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                <div class="textwidget">
                 <p>
                  Hi folks! I’m Abdul Qadir Ahmed Abbasi hailing from Kashmir, Pakistan; a Computer Science graduate with an adequate experience of Software Engineering; a happy traveler with a passion for nature, culture & history; and a father to one beautiful daughter named Harrum (meaning “noble woman”).
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  I’m in L’Aquila, Italy for my higher studies under the Erasmus Mundus program titled as “Software Engineers 4 Green Deal”. So far, it has been a great experience for my both personal and professional development. I am very happy to be exposed to advanced areas of Software Engineering ie, Software Architecture, Software Engineering for IoTs, Model Driven Engineering & Software Quality Engineering.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  Why did I choose SE4GD? Firstly, the integration of “Sustainability” & “Software” has been very appealing for me as it has a vast range of domains to offer for research and work in the present & near future. Secondly, it has not only provided me with excellent learning opportunities within the class but also outside the classroom because of mobility across multiple European countries (ie, Italy, Finland, Netherlands).
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  Although, it is just a start of this amazing journey, but I believe that the best has yet to come. For me, it is going to be a lifetime experience which will not only make me a better professional but also a better human in the end. I am very excited and happy to be a part of SE4GD family.
                 </p>

					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
  </script>
